name: LostWithOculothoracs
description:
LostWithOculothoracs is a singleplayer platformer story-based game, where you the hero are stranded with steven the oculothoracs. Throuought the game you collect different artifacts in different realms, to craft the portal home, But the story twists when... CONTROLS: Move Left - "A" or "ArrowLeft" Move Right - "D" or "ArrowRight" Jump - "W" or "Space" Dash - "LShift" or "X" Action Key - "E" Pause - "Escape" Collect all 12 artifacts to return home Dash your way through them

Parkour your way through them Get through difficult mazes Combine the mechanics

Go to other realms
